snippet: In 2011, Osama bin Laden was the most popular global topic on Facebook, while the resignation of President Hosni Mubarak of Egypt was the top news issue on Twitter.
abstract: In 2011, Osama bin Laden was the most popular global topic on Facebook, while the resignation of President Hosni Mubarak of Egypt was the top news issue on Twitter.

headline.main: Top Social Topics in '11: Bin Laden and Mubarak
headline.print_headline: Top Social Topics in ’11: Bin Laden and Mubarak
